name: Santa Runner
description: Classic timekiller-runner about Santa Claus. Collect scattered gifts and destroy the zombies that attack you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
